author: Adam Wells
title: UK Building 400-Bed Field Hospital at Nutter Fieldhouse to Aid Pandemic Response
description: Nutter Field House, the University of Kentucky's football practice and indoor track and field facility, will be turned into a field hospital to aid in the coronavirus pandemic response...
content:
Joe Robbins/Getty Images
Nutter Field House, the University of Kentucky's football practice and indoor track and field facility, will be turned into a field hospital to aid in the coronavirus pandemic response. 
Per John Clay of the Lexington Herald-Leader,… [+269 chars]
